original_title: Sun directly over Nallur, Paranthan, Chundikkulam today
original_body_lines: On the apparent northward relative motion of the sun, it will be directly over the Nallur, Paranthan and Chundikkulam areas at about 12:10 pm, the Meteorology Department said.
The department said the sun started moving directly over the latitudes of Sri Lanka from April 5 and will continue to do so till April 15 this year. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
